item.title: Running Large Language Models at Home Using Petals
item.description: Overview Petals is an open source project that allows running large language models (LLMs) like LLMa, GPT-3 etc in a distributed, peer-to-peer fashion similar to BitTorrent. By sharing GPU resources with others, you can run models too large to fit on a single GPU.
